channel.title: Storage on Canux's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Storage on Canux's Blog

item.title: Storage_Command
item.description: sysstat: 1 2 3 4 5 6 # <https://github.com/sysstat/sysstat> $ sudo apt-get install sysstat # 包括 iostat/mpstat/pidstat/tapestat/cifsiostat # 查看diskio信息 $ sudo iostat iotop 1 2 3 # 查看进程的diskio $ sudo apt-get install iotop $ sudo iotop df df计算文件系统磁盘空间使
